text: Kamaghɨn amizɨma Pol ko Barnabas atiatir puvatɨgha, akar bar gavgavimɨn me mɨgei, “Ia Judaba, ga faragha Godɨn akamɨn ia mɨkeme. Ezɨ ia akɨrim ragha akar kam gasara. Egha ghaze, e ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuir zurara itim inian kogham. Kamaghɨn amizɨma, ia oragh, ga uam akar kamɨn ia mɨkɨman kogham. Ga Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazibav kɨmam.
